caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A father and his daughter are in conversation, and the girl holds a sword in her hand, but her expression appears very despondent. Her father comforts her, and the girl regains her composure. She twirls the sword briefly and then puts it away. Afterward, her father departs. In a high tower, a child lies in bed, having awakened. Sitting beside him is an elderly woman knitting, and they are engaged in conversation. Meanwhile, a group of horsemen enters a city, led by a woman and a plump man. The woman follows the man into a house where they are greeted by another man. It seems they are holding some kind of secretive meeting.
